storyList.PART_1: I'm feeling so burned out..! I need a break, and I really like the sound of your idea. Name's [name], by the way!
storyList.PART_2: It's so relaxing out here... I'm starting to feel less braindead already!
storyList.PART_3: This has been great, and I feel so much more stable now - I think I'm in the right headspace to get back to my passions. See you around!
storyList.PART_4: Hey! Great to see you again, and this place looks better than ever! Take a break if you're feeling tired though, okay? We can handle things here if you do!

storyList.PART_1: Hi, I'm... um... [name]! I'd like to come with you, if that's okay..!
storyList.PART_2: Sorry for the awkward introduction - I'm still getting used to saying '[name]' out loud... but it feels easier to do that here.
storyList.PART_3: It's been wonderful spending time around people who are so accepting of me; I'm feeling so much more confident about myself, knowing you all have my back!
storyList.PART_4: Hiiiii!! Guess who got their name officially changed on their passport today?!

storyList.PART_1: Hello! I'm [name]! I just quit my job
storyList.PART_2: Have you spoken to [otherfriend]? They are really cool! We've been bonding over our shared experiences
storyList.PART_3: This was amazing! I'll never forget the friends I made here. I'm off to travel the world!
storyList.PART_4: Hoi! Bonjour! Olï¿½! I learned so much in my travels
